bibl.title: Doxographical Deformation of Medical Tradition in the Report of the Anonymus Londinensis on Philolaus.
bibl.note: P. lit. Lond. 165 (= Pack2 2339; Marganne 102). Selects the passage on Philolaus, as an example of the Anonymus' way of handling his doxographical material: XVIII 8-XIX 1; XX 1-24.
bibl.seg: MANETTI Daniela, Doxographical Deformation of Medical Tradition in the Report of the Anonymus Londinensis on Philolaus.
P. lit. Lond. 165 (= Pack2 2339; Marganne 102). Selects the passage on Philolaus, as an example of the Anonymus' way of handling his doxographical material: XVIII 8-XIX 1; XX 1-24.
